name: create_credit_card_tool
description: A tool that allows the agent to create a new credit card record in the system. You need to provide the cardName, description, and annualFee in the JSON body. Annual fee must be a valid decimal number. If not annual fee save as 0.00

cardName.description: The name of the credit card

description.description: A brief description of the credit card.

annualFee.description: The annual fee for the credit card as a string
